211.punchline: I’d rather see a pregnant woman standing on the bus than a fat girl sitting down crying.

212.punchline: My girlfriend told me today that she has 2 cunts and apparently I’m one of them.

213.punchline: I used to be in love with a girl from Moscow. I almost asked her to marry me but I didn’t want to Russia.

214.punchline:
Three reasons why my wife is like a computer. 1. She’s good at remembering credit card details. 
2. She knows everything about every subject. 
3. She always complains about having a virus whenever you try and do anything dirty with her.

215.punchline: I disabled my popup blocker earlier today, or got a divorce as some people call it.

216.punchline:
Me and my girlfriend were in the throes of sexual ecstasy last night when she whispered, “leave me breathless darling.” 
So I punched her in the stomach.

217.punchline: Q. Why is a wife like a candle?  A. Because if you you’re not careful with them they can take away your house.

218.punchline: My mom always used to say “If you haven’t got anything nice to say then you can go f*ck yourself”.

219.punchline:
Roses are red 
Violets are blue 
Love me today 
Or I Kill you.

220.punchline: They say opposites attract, try telling that to my short ugly girlfriend.

221.punchline:
How do you turn a fox into an elephant? 
Marry it.

222.punchline: Can’t believe how quickly the batteries keep running out on my smoke alarm. Really need to get my wife some cooking lessons this Christmas.

223.punchline:
Roses are red 
Violets are blue 
Love me today 
Or I Kill you.

224.punchline: Why is Cupid is a symbol for love? Personally, I find the idea of an arrow being shot through your heart by a flying baby extremely horrifying.

225.punchline: British scientists have demonstrated that cigarettes can harm your children. Fair enough. Use an ashtray!

226.punchline:
Phone rings at 2am. Husband: Hello, who is this? How the hell do I know I’m not a weather man! *slams phone down* 
Wife: Who was that honey? 
Husband: Just some guy asking if the coast was clear tonight.

227.punchline: Today my wife told me that I need to be more spontaneous so I punched her in the throat.

228.punchline:
Three reasons why a woman is like a bottle of wine? 1. They’re difficult to pick. 
2. They become more expensive with time. 
3. If you taste it too early its a gRAPE.

229.punchline:
After 3 years of marriage, me and the wife had our first real fight last night. 
I called my dad for advice on how to fix things. 
He told me to apologize and admit I was wrong. 
I was really looking for advice on how to dispose of the body.

230.punchline: Met my wife working at a toll road. She really raised the bar.

231.punchline:
Three reasons why a woman is like a bottle of wine? 1. They’re difficult to pick. 
2. They become more expensive with time. 
3. If you taste it too early its a gRAPE.

232.punchline: My daughter was born yesterday. I named her after my mother-in-law, she’s called ‘passive-aggressive psycho’.

233.punchline: I can’t believe how ungrateful my 4 year old son is. I took him out for a ride on his sledge this morning but after 10 minutes I looked back and saw he was missing. It was lucky I had to stop for petrol otherwise I may not have noticed and it would have taken ages to drive back and find him.

234.punchline: To make a relationship work you need to make a lot of sacrifices which is why I keep a large number of goats in my garden.

235.punchline: Just broken up with my girlfriend after she told me she used to be Christian.  ..It might seem judgmental, but I have only known her since she was Christine.

236.punchline:
Q. What do you call a woman paralyzed from the waste down? 
A. Married

237.punchline: When my girlfriend is on her period she always ovary-acts.

238.punchline:
My girlfriend left me because I’m too insecure. 
No wait, she’s back. 
She just went to make a cup of coffee.

239.punchline: When your ex-girlfriend tells you she has AIDS it can be really difficult to deal with. I had to try really hard to sound surprised.

240.punchline: I’m so bad with women I can’t even get them to take their gloves off.

241.punchline: I got really love sick the other day working away from home. Went to the doctors and they said it was chlamydia.

242.punchline: Can’t believe my wife. Tried to have sex with her in the dark last night. I put my wiener into her hand and she “No thanks I don’t want to smoke.”

243.punchline: Just broke up with my girlfriend after I caught her lying. She was lying under another man.

244.punchline: I heard you are looking for someone to build an ark for you… I think i noah guy!

245.punchline: Me and my wife met on the net… We were both trapeze artists.

246.punchline:
The following conversation took place between a husband and wife whilst at a restaurant.  Husband: What do you want to drink? 
Wife: I guess I’ll have champagne. 
Husband: Guess again.. Maybe you should go for a diet coke?

247.punchline: What do coffee beans and woman have in common? They’re both useless until their wet.

248.punchline:
The following conversation took place at the vets. Man: Do you sell horse tranquilizers? 
Vet: Why do you ask? 
Man: My wife keeps waking up.

249.punchline: Can’t believe how kinky my wife is, she loves it in the ear. Everytime I put it near her face she turns her head to the side.

250.punchline: Had a talk with my son earlier today about masterbation and how it’s totally natural. I also told him to make sure that in future he knocks on my door before he goes into my room.

251.punchline:
Why do cannibals not like divorced women? 
Because they’re bitter.

252.punchline: Why do women love gold more than men?  Because gold has 24 carrots whereas a man only has 1 carrot !

253.punchline: Some people say love is the key to happiness but it’s a lie…  It’s beer.

254.punchline: My wife recently told me she wanted to go around the world so for her birthday I decided to buy her an atlas.

255.punchline: My wife recently told me that sex is a lot better on holiday… I was really upset when I got the postcard.

256.punchline:
Q. What does an Ikea cabinet and a marriage have in common? 
A. One screw out of place and the whole thing falls apart.

257.punchline: Last night my wife asked me to treat her like a princess so I bought her a Mercedes and drove her into a wall.

258.punchline: I heard women find men in long-term relationships more attractive than men who are single so I’ve decided to move into a 1 bedroom apartment with my mum.

259.punchline:
My girlfriend just told me she has a STD… 
I think I’m Gonorrhoea-valuate our relationship

260.punchline: Slept on the sofa last night. Apparently when my wife asked me to bring her something from the store for pancakes she wasn’t talking about a bra.

261.punchline:
Q. What do women and 0% APR loans have in common? 
A. They both have extremely complicated terms and they both keep saying they have no interest.

262.punchline:
Q. Why do women talk too much and men overthink everything? 
A. Because women have 4 lips and men have 2 heads.

263.punchline: Me and my parents have always had a difficult relationship. At dinner when we used to have alphabet spaghetti they used to spell ‘f*ck off’ on my plate.

264.punchline: Can’t believe how thirsty my Grandma is. Just drove past her house and she’s got about 10 pints of milk on her doorstep.

265.punchline: I’m not saying my wife’s ugly but the other day she went to the next door neighbour’s house to tell them to keep the noise down and she can’t back with some sweets.

266.punchline: Me and my wife had a threesome last night with my best friend, it was the most incredible sex we’ve ever had. I know he enjoyed it as well, his tail hasn’t stopped wagging since.

267.punchline: I first met my wife at the London 2012 Special Olympics, it was a no brainier.

268.punchline: Me and my wife had a candlelit dinner for the first time last night. It was terrible, everything was really under-cooked and tasted of wax.

269.punchline: My wife wanted a bag and a belt for her birthday so I got her a vacuum cleaner.

270.punchline: Fed up of being single? Fed up of dating websites? I’ve now developed the perfect strategy that is guaranteed success. Just lower your standards. My new girlfriend is actually a coconut sellotaped to a mop.

271.punchline:
Five signs that a women is angry with you.  1. She’s silent. 
2. She’s yelling. 
3. She acts the same. 
4. She acts different. 
5. She murdered you.

272.punchline: I come from a small family. I’m the youngest of three, my parents are both older.

273.punchline:
W. Washing 
I. Ironing 
F. F*cking 
E. Etcetera

274.punchline: Don’t you just hate it when you kiss a girl and her eyes are open. It usually means you have about 5 minutes before she regains consciousness.

275.punchline: Spent the whole of last night experimenting with drugs.  I put acid into my wife’s tea.

276.punchline: Granddad finally came out of a coma last night. He’s now dead.

277.punchline: I love minorities. My wife is actually an intelligent woman.

278.punchline: If you ever get into a knife fight with a girl bring some bread and mayo. They can’t resist making sandwiches.

279.punchline: My ex-wife used to love chocolate. I think that’s one of the reasons why she ran off with a Jamaican man.

280.punchline:
The following conversation took place between a husband and wife. Husband: It’s a bit muggy tonight my love. 
Wife: If you’ve put all our mugs in the garden again I’m gonna divorce you. 
Husband: *Drinks a sip of tea from plant pot.*

281.punchline: Why do brides wear white? So the dishwasher matches the refrigerator.

282.punchline:
The following conversation took place at a church wedding: Priest: Repeat after me. 
Groom: After me!! 
Priest: Is this guy serious?? 
Bride: No his name is Bruce.

283.punchline: My wife shouted at me today for forgetting to take the lamb out the freezer. Sadly it couldn’t withstand the freezing temperatures and died after a couple of hours.

284.punchline:
My daughters just got to the age where she’s starting to ask awkward questions about sex. 
Then other day she asked “Is that the best you can do?”

285.punchline: My wife recently starting taking cooking lessons and last night she surprised me by making spaghetti puttanesca with freshly baked garlic bread. After we finished the meal she said “Now be brutally honest, what did you think?”. I said “That meal was incredible, you fat c*nt”.
